roleset.name: to gather clams
roleset.note: CLAM-V NOTES: Frames file for 'clam' based on dictionary.com. Verbnet entry 13.7. frame by Perryn (from clam.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: ARG0
example.text: They climbed El Machorro, they clammed for 300 clams, the toured our friend's new Condo in El Dorado, came back and cooked the clams to add to the hamburger supper now being served to 13 people.
